channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Crowd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Crowd

item.title: CVE-2019-20104|2024-09-16T17:04:16.877Z -- atlassian -- crowd
item.description: The OpenID client application in Atlassian Crowd before version 3.6.2, and from version 3.7.0 before 3.7.1 allows remote attackers to perform a Denial of Service attack via an XML Entity Expansion vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-18109|2024-09-16T17:08:13.135Z -- atlassian -- crowd
item.description: The login resource of CrowdId in Atlassian Crowd before version 3.0.2 and from version 3.1.0 before version 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to redirect users to a different website which they may use as part of performing a phishing attack via an open redirect.

item.title: CVE-2017-18110|2024-09-16T18:08:23.904Z -- atlassian -- crowd
item.description: The administration backup restore resource in Atlassian Crowd before version 3.0.2 and from version 3.1.0 before version 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to read files from the filesystem via a XXE vulnerability.
